definition: to cover up/to conceal/to go into hiding
to conceal/to hide away/to harbor/to store/to collect

sentences.english: Former Bosnian Serb general Ratko Mladic spent sixteen years in hiding.
sentences.chinese: 前波斯尼亞塞族將軍姆拉迪奇藏匿花了十六年。

sentences.english: Sometimes love is hiding between the seconds of your life.
sentences.chinese: 有時候愛情就藏匿在生活中的瞬間裏頭。

sentences.english: Treasury in a box too much, difficult to find out the printing plate hiding place.
sentences.chinese: 金庫中箱子太多，難以找出印版的藏匿處。

sentences.english: Secure, however, in the inscrutability of my place of concealment, I felt no embarrassment whatsoever.
sentences.chinese: 我藏匿屍體的地方很安全，所以我一點也不慌張。

sentences.english: Sinks and draining boards can harbour germs.
sentences.chinese: 水槽和排水板會藏匿細菌。

sentences.english: Zheng Huiren accidentally received contact with the broker has been hiding the right to contact.
sentences.chinese: 鄭慧仁意外接到一直藏匿着的經紀人權京勳的聯絡。

sentences.english: The police detective got a line on where the thief was hiding and soon after apprehended him.
sentences.chinese: 警察得到小偷藏匿處的線索，迅即逮捕了他。

sentences.english: The police found a knife together with the stolen money, hidden in a hollow tree.
sentences.chinese: 警察在一個樹洞裏找到了藏匿的小刀，還有贓款。

sentences.english: And though death may hide me, and the greater silence enfold me.
sentences.chinese: 即使死神將我的身形藏匿，更浩瀚的靜寂將我包圍。

sentences.english: Senior al-Qaida figures are sheltering on his turf.
sentences.chinese: 基地組織高層人物藏匿在他的地盤。

sentences.english: Small shoes are unlikely to have bombs hidden inside, Mr. Pistole said.
sentences.chinese: 皮斯托爾說，孩子的鞋子很小，不大可能藏匿炸彈。

sentences.english: Secure, however, in the 36)inscrutability of my place of concealment, I felt no embarrassment whatsoever.
sentences.chinese: 我藏匿屍體的地方很安全，所以我一點也不慌張。

sentences.english: The police tracked the terrorists to their hide-out.
sentences.chinese: 警方跟蹤恐怖分子至其藏匿處。

sentences.english: The village was once a pirates' lair .
sentences.chinese: 這個村子曾一度是海盜藏匿之處。

sentences.english: But I remember that his arrest for hidding killed weapons largely.
sentences.chinese: 但是我記得他是因大規模藏匿殺傷性武器被捕。

sentences.english: A large spy ring exists in this city.
sentences.chinese: 該市藏匿着一個龐大的間諜網。

definition: to conceal oneself/to go into hiding/to take cover
to hide/to go into hiding/to take refuge
to try to find out/to trace/to track down
to hunt and arrest (fugitives)/to track down and arrest/a manhunt
hidden beneath the surface/buried and concealed
